content.rendered:
THE BEST

SUMMER CAMP

Why Kings Club Summer Camp

OUR APPROACH

Kings Club's summer camps offers a diverse range of activities and programs that cater to a variety of interests and skills. Kings Club aims to provide children with an engaging and enjoyable way to spend their summer. This approach appears to be focused on providing a well-rounded and fun summer camp experience for children.

SKILLED TEACHERS

Kings Club's summer camps feature highly skilled and passionate teachers who specialize in various fields, such as swimming, dance, badminton, art and craft, karate, and more. These instructors create a safe and supportive learning environment using innovative teaching methods to make learning fun and engaging for children.

FLEXIBLE TIMING

Kings Club's summer camps offer flexible timing options that cater to the needs of busy families. Whether parents need to drop off their child early in the morning or pick them up in the afternoon, Kings Club's flexible timing options ensure that children can participate in the camps while parents can manage their work.

Our Summer Camp Includes

Swimming

Badminton

Billiards

Dance

CHOOSE YOUR SPORT AND JOIN KINGS CLUB

Kings Club’s summer camps provide children with the opportunity to choose their preferred sport and join a camp that caters to their interests. With a variety of camps available, children can explore new sports, develop new skills, and enhance their existing abilities in their chosen activity.

Joining Kings Club summer camp is an excellent way for children to have a fun and engaging summer experience while also enhancing their skills and learning new things.

JOIN US TODAY

Types of Classes

Previous
Next
  • Infant swimming classes: Kings Club Swimming Academy is one of the perfect places of learning for infants as young as 3 years.
  • Aqua fit classes: Our aqua fit classes are a unique blend of aqua aerobics and swimming that make the ultimate fitness session with a lot of fun and high calorie burning.
  • Summer swimming camps: The camps are designed in suitable timings and favorably isolated into batches for children, women and a combination of all.
  • Basic & advanced training: Our basic and advanced training sessions are passionate and focused training programs to benefit swimmers in competitions and include stroke correction, technique & timing improvement.

Sports Calendar

Kings Club provides sports facilities & events to people of every age from children right up to senior citizens. This all makes Kings Club a unique & special & magnificent place to be a home away from home.
Camp 1Camp 2Camp 3
From 30th March to 19th AprilFrom 20th April to 10th MayFrom 11th May to 31st May

*18 sessions; Swimming Pool will remain closed on Sundays

Classes open for all age groups from 4 years & above for all 3 Levels

Types of Classes

Kings Club Badminton Academy has classes for all ages & levels. Our training programs are personalized and tailored to the characteristics of every training group using the precise methodology. We organize tournaments for each age group and in all the levels from sub-junior to senior national level. Also, make your summer more exciting and sporty by learning badminton at Kings Club Badminton Academy.

Upcoming Sports Calendar

The King’s Club offers a wide range of sports & events to people of all ages, from kids to seniors. It provides all the elements that make Kings Club a home away from home that is unique, special, and magnificent.  

Camp 1Camp 2Camp 3
From 1st April to 30th AprilFrom 1st May to 1st JuneFrom 1st June to 30th June
